name: @brikcss/component
description: A scaffolding / starter repo for new brikcss components.
author: The Zimmee <thezimmee@gmail.com>

scripts.// [START]: Run `npm start` as an alias for development.
scripts.// [DEV]: // Run a development build (not including production tasks, such as minifying files).
scripts.dev: concurrently --names=sass:build,js:build --kill-others-on-fail "npm run sass:build" "npm run js:build -- --no-stats" || npm run prod:fail
scripts.// [WATCH]: For local development. Watches files, rebuilds when source files change, runs local server with live reload.
scripts.watch: concurrently --raw "npm run js:watch" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.// [SERVE]: Run browser-sync for local development server with live reload.
scripts.// [PROD]: // Run a clean production / distribution build (runs development and production tasks).
scripts.preprod:
. lib/hooks/pretask-check.sh tests || npm run test && echo "
Starting production build...
" && npm run prod:clean
scripts.prod: . lib/hooks/pretask-check.sh build || cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently --names=sass:build,sass:dist,js:build --kill-others-on-fail "npm run sass:build -- --env=prod" "npm run sass:dist" "npm run js:build" || npm run prod:fail
scripts.prod:clean:
echo "
Cleaning previous `dist` files...
" && rimraf dist
scripts.// [TESTS]: UI and unit tests, as well as code quality checkers.
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names=sass:lint,js:lint "npm run sass:lint" "npm run js:lint" || npm run test:fail
scripts.// [JS]: // Build JS bundles / flavors with webpack.
scripts.js:watch: chokidar src/js/**/*.js --command 'eslint {path} --format=stylish && echo "[ok] JS lint complete."' & npm run js:build -- --watch --no-stats
scripts.sass:watch: chokidar src/sass/*.scss -c 'npm run sass:build -- --file={path} && echo "[ok] Sass lint complete."' --verbose
scripts.// [GIT|HUSKY]: // Helpers for interacting with git and husky (githooks).
scripts.commit:
echo "See the "git commit policy" in CONTRIBUTING.md for details on how to write a valid commit message.
" && git-cz
scripts.// prepush:: Runs the production build and checks for a clean state (excluding untracked files).
scripts.prepush:
npm run git:checkstage && npm run prod && npm run git:checkstage && echo "
Pushing code...
"
scripts.// [RELEASE]: Semantic release manages our release process.
scripts.release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
